hero.realtimeMobile: Real-time mobile strategy & NFT market economy game

faq.LCDesc: A realtime mobile strategy and NFT market economy game, built on Solana.
faq.whatsLADA: What is LADA? How do I get it?
faq.LADADesc: LADA will be the native LadderCaster in-game Token. It will be available on the Serum orderbook on launch day. LADA Tokens will initially be sold for $0.01.
faq.whitelist: Is there a Whitelist or Pre-Sale?
faq.whitelistDesc: There are no Whitelists or Pre-Sales. The only way to get LADA Token is to trade it on Serum/Jupiter April 8th at 18:00 UTC.
faq.mintDesc: You will only be able to Mint Casters on April, 8th at 18:OO UTC. Casters will cost 1000 LADA Tokens.
faq.marketplaceDesc: LadderCaster characters and items can be listed on Fractal.is, a gaming NFT marketplace; Holaplex, an open-source marketplace, and Magic Eden, Solana’s largest marketplace. Players are able to list NFT drops for durable in-game assets and sell directly to other players.

error.stakeBalance: Can't stake more than your balance.

content.stakeDesc: Want to put your LADA to work?
content.stakeDesc2: Stake and get back to looting.
